title: Stunning, renovated, 2B/2B, top-floor condo with garage
posting_body: ['Renting spacious 2 bedroom/2 bathroom, amazing, peaceful remodeled condo in Lakewood, CO (Green Mountain).', 'Home also has new paint and carpet/laminate flooring throughout the entire unit.', 'Seeking professional, peaceful and responsible tenant for nicely appointed and remodeled 2B/2B condo in Lakewood, Colorado, off 6th and Simms.', "The condo sits near Green Mountain, by new Light Rail, Union Square Park, St. Anthony's hospital, revitalized Union Street, 12 minutes from Denver, close to lots of trails, shopping and mountains.", 'Home is located on top floor, has vaulted ceilings, sky light, measures 1,200 square feet, has granite kitchen countertop, stainless appliances, tile flooring in kitchen and bathrooms, fireplace, air conditioning, new light fixtures, tennis court, swimming pool, newer roof, new skylight, clubhouse and awesome neighbors!', 'Cost includes: use of newer upright washer/dryer, 1-car garage plus 1 reserved parking space, furniture use (though it may be rented without furnishings) utilities and HOA fees.', 'Rent is $1,975 per month.', 'Tenant will pay deposit (first month’s rent) upon approval (background and credit checks required).', 'Sorry but no pets nor smoking or vaping of any kind.', 'Lease duration negotiable and available immediately.', 'Please respond if you or someone you know of is looking for a remodeled, peaceful, clean, quiet and happy home near the city and the hills.']
